Question
========
The partial correlation matrix below, including zero-order correlations,
investigated whether there is a relationship between age and the salary
of a catwalk model and whether this relationship changes when you hold
the influence of the model's attractiveness constant. Y = Salary (in
pounds), X = Age (in years), and the third variable (Z) is
attractiveness (Beauty: a scale where a higher score means higher
attractiveness).  
![](1605615806837.png)
  
If you round off the correlations to two decimal places, which causal
model applies to the results of the analysis?
